__e: Look, right now with Hannah and everything, I just think it'd be better.
Hannah and I haven't talked in two weeks, so you don't know what she thinks.
You've done so much for us already, but, well, we found something inside one of the books in Hannah's locker, and we... we don't know what it is, so I was hoping that maybe you could tell us.
Dad, I know you mean well, but Hannah is my best friend.
I have never in my life been to anyone... what Hannah is to him.
My son is worth everything to me, as I'm sure Hannah is to you.
- How are we Gonna know where Hannah's body is, though?
Hannah's just trying to do what you should've done months ago.
So, you're more than welcome to spend the night, but you'll have to crash on the couch since Hannah is now in your room.
Hannah, you don't think people can die for a cause?
Well, when you said that Hannah didn't want to see me...
Hannah's truth is not my truth.
I mean, face it, no matter how important something is to me, it always comes in second to Hannah Montana.
And I would appreciate it if I could have one conversation without hearing the words Hannah Montana.
Because you're my best friend. When I was sitting in my room, all upset, you're the one I wanted to talk to, not Hannah Montana.
Hannah, you just got your son back.
Hannah,you are one of the most important people in my life, and so is my husnd
What you say to Hannah, you say to all of us.
